body_html: @resec the build drops the lib in a place that's specific to the arch etc. If you move it somewhere else, it loses the information. If it survives cleanups, then it's adding a confusing side effect with weaker guarantees on which people would accidentally depend. I'd rather we avoid this.

body: @resec the build drops the lib in a place that's specific to the arch etc. If you move it somewhere else, it loses the information. If it survives cleanups, then it's adding a confusing side effect with weaker guarantees on which people would accidentally depend. I'd rather we avoid this.
